amendatorysection.catchline: Judicial sale; sheriff as master commissioner.
amendatorysection.para: A sheriff may act as a master commissioner under subdivision (1)(b) of section 25-1326. Sales made under such subdivision shall conform in all respects to the laws regulating sales of land upon execution.

annotation.para: Officer cannot be compelled to advertise sale in any particular newspaper. State ex rel. Elliott v. Holliday, 35 Neb. 327, 53 N.W. 142 (1892).
